title: Chelsea vs Newcastle LIVE - Plus Premier League action from Tottenham vs Watford and the rest
text:
Chelsea host Newcastle at Stamford Bridge in the pick of this afternoon's Premier League fixtures.

Frank Lampard's men will look to continue their recent winning form as they seek a seventh consecutive Premier League home win against the Magpies.

Elsewhere, Tottenham host Watford in north London, while the likes of Leicester and Wolves are also in action during a busy afternoon of football.

Sportmail's Jonathan Spencer will provide live coverage of the 3pm Premier League games including scores, lineups and build-up, with full commentary of Chelsea vs Newcastle.
description: Chelsea host Newcastle at Stamford Bridge in the pick of this afternoon's Premier League fixtures. Tottenham host Watford, while Leicester and Wolves are also in action this afternoon.
